metadata.Description: Electricity generated by the force of falling or flowing water, typically from a dam or a river.

hydroelectricity.Description: Hydroelectricity implements the Hydropower Policy by promoting the development and utilization of hydropower resources.
Hydroelectricity funds infrastructure projects to support the construction and maintenance of hydropower plants.
Hydroelectricity focuses on river basin management to ensure sustainable water resource utilization for hydropower generation.
Hydroelectricity plays a role in the renewable energy transition by providing a reliable and renewable source of electricity.
Hydroelectricity partners with local communities to ensure their participation and benefit sharing in hydropower projects.
Hydroelectricity contributes to sustainable development by providing clean and renewable energy for economic growth and poverty reduction.
Hydroelectricity monitors hydropower generation to ensure efficient and sustainable utilization of hydropower resources.
Hydroelectricity targets electrification by providing reliable and affordable electricity to remote and rural areas through hydropower projects.
